description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，汉族。曾任新疆生产建设兵团司令员、新疆维吾尔自治区人民政府副主席等职，现任中国人民政治协商会议新疆维吾尔自治区委员会副主席。因在新疆的任职经历，受到美国和加拿大的制裁。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, of Han ethnicity. He has served as the commander of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps and vice chairman of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region People's Government. He is currently a vice chairman of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference. Due to his tenure in Xinjiang, he has been sanctioned by the United States and Canada.

description.en: A paramilitary and governmental organization in China's Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任新疆生产建设兵团司令员。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as the commander of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替彭家瑞担任新疆生产建设兵团司令员。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who succeeded Peng Jiarui as the commander of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国人民政治协商会议新疆维吾尔自治区委员会主席。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as the Chairman of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任新疆维吾尔自治区人民政府主席。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as the Chairman of the People's Government of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任新疆维吾尔自治区人民政府主席。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, currently serving as the Chairman of the People's Government of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国甘肃省下辖的地级市，彭家瑞的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Gansu Province, China, and the birthplace of Peng Jiarui.

nodes.id: 全球马格尼茨基人权问责法

zh-cn: 全球马格尼茨基人权问责法
en: Global Magnitsky Human Rights Accountability Act

description.zh-cn: 一项美国联邦法律，授权美国政府对全球范围内的人权侵犯者及腐败分子实施制裁。
description.en: A U.S. federal law that authorizes the U.S. government to sanction human rights offenders and corrupt actors worldwide.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，与彭家瑞一同受到美国财政部制裁。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who was sanctioned by the U.S. Department of the Treasury along with Peng Jiarui.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾接替彭家瑞担任中共新疆维吾尔自治区委员会秘书长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who succeeded Peng Jiarui as the Secretary-General of the CCP Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Regional Committee.

description.zh-cn: 美国财政部依照《全球马格尼茨基人权问责法》相关行政命令对彭家瑞实施制裁。
description.en: The U.S. Department of the Treasury sanctioned Peng Jiarui in accordance with the executive order related to the Global Magnitsky Human Rights Accountability Act.

description.zh-cn: 因参与侵犯人权，加拿大外交部宣布对彭家瑞实施制裁。
description.en: Global Affairs Canada announced sanctions against Peng Jiarui for his involvement in human rights violations.

description.zh-cn: 彭家瑞接替刘新齐出任新疆生产建设兵团司令员。
description.en: Peng Jiarui succeeded Liu Xinqi as the commander of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps.

description.zh-cn: 薛斌接替彭家瑞出任新疆生产建设兵团司令员。
description.en: Xue Bin succeeded Peng Jiarui as the commander of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps.

description.zh-cn: 李鹏新接替彭家瑞出任中共新疆维吾尔自治区委员会秘书长。
description.en: Li Pengxin succeeded Peng Jiarui as the Secretary-General of the CCP Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Regional Committee.

description.zh-cn: 与孙金龙一同被美国财政部制裁。
description.en: Was sanctioned by the U.S. Department of the Treasury along with Sun Jinlong.

description.zh-cn: 在中国人民政治协商会议新疆维吾尔自治区委员会中，彭家瑞担任副主席，努尔兰·阿不都满金为时任主席。
description.en: In the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Committee of the CPPCC, Peng Jiarui served as Vice Chairman while Nurlan Abelmanjin was the Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 在新疆维吾尔自治区人民政府中，彭家瑞担任副主席，雪克来提·扎克尔为时任主席。
description.en: In the People's Government of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region, Peng Jiarui served as Vice Chairman while Shohrat Zakir was the Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 在新疆维吾尔自治区人民政府中，彭家瑞担任副主席，艾尔肯·吐尼亚孜为时任主席。
description.en: In the People's Government of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region, Peng Jiarui served as Vice Chairman while Erkin Tuniyaz was the Chairman.
